instruction: What kinds of spectrum was used on the accurate retrieval of nitrogen content?
Output: On the accurate retrieval of nitrogen content,the researchers used visible remote sensing spectrum.

instruction: What spectral feature processing methods were used on the accurate retrieval of nitrogen content?
Output: The spectral feature processing methods used for the accurate retrieval of nitrogen content were NDCSI for canopy hyperspectral image extraction, MCCM for screening sensitive wavelengths, and the establishment of nitrogen content retrieval models based on spectral characteristic parameters.

instruction: What metric was chosen to evaluate the performance on the accurate retrieval of nitrogen content?
Output: The metric chosen to evaluate the performance of the nitrogen content retrieval models in the related study was the R-2 (R-squared) value.

instruction: What machine learning model was selected as the optimal model for nitrogen content retrieval in this study on the accurate retrieval of nitrogen content based on UAV hyperspectral images?
Output: The optimal machine learning model selected for nitrogen content retrieval in this study was the Support Vector Machine (SVM) model.

instruction: Can the screened sensitive wavelengths for nitrogen content (470, 474, 490, 514, 582, 634, and 682 nm) be used in this research on the accurate retrieval of nitrogen content based on UAV hyperspectral images?
Output: Yes, the screened sensitive wavelengths for nitrogen content (470, 474, 490, 514, 582, 634, and 682 nm) can be used in this research on the accurate retrieval of nitrogen content based on UAV hyperspectral images.
